section.name: Component Strategy
section.p: The Metro component strategy is an object model supporting the formal commissioning and decommissioning of objects taking into account thread safety, lifestyle, lifecycle, and structural composition. Resources supporting strategy delivery include the following:

ol.li: runtime policies dealing with activation, instantiation, and garbage collection
formal semantics and patterns through which a class can declare a runtime context (including service and resource dependencies), and the internal parts defining a component structure
class level annotations that associate runtime policies and supporting metadata with a class
